description: Fired when an actor successfully stops following a leader. A listener rule is expected to handle this event to generate a perceptible log entry.

actorId.description: The ID of the entity that stopped following.

targetId.description: The ID of the entity that was being followed.

descriptionText.description: The pre-formatted, human-readable log message for the event, such as 'Player stops following Goblin Sentry'.

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the event occurred.

perceptionType.description: The category of the perception, typically 'action_target_general' for this type of event.
